TopicTitle: Game hang on boot with ground view from space center

Articles.Content:
This is how my KSP usualy look like.

[![7rgr5ot.png](http://i.imgur.com/7rgr5ot.png)](http://imgur.com/7rgr5ot)

I can go back to main menu but the game hangs if I do, same if I access the alarm clock. 

Happens most times I start KSP, its not an obious memory issue as ksp only uses 2GB.

Is this an known bug? 

Some mods karbonite and extraplanetary launchpads, TAC and KAS. ActiveTextureManagement, alarm clock

Could you post your output\_log?

to find it please read [this on how to get support.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29)

This only ever happened to me after spending an extended time in the VAB building a large vessel and then leaving the VAB, never seen it on first load in.
